title: Person of Interest - Foe Ending
author: snatchingsouls
comment: Outstanding, one of my favourite endings to an episode ever. This track has been in my playlist ever since. Quality meets quality. Thanks for the upload.

"You need to know this is right."

A sentence usually said by people that are not in the right.
this was the "hook line and sinker" for me.....love this show

Omg I cried so much! I just started watching this and this episode got me bad! This is not suppose to be a show that makes me cry lol all these actors did such a great job, the lady was good, the bad guy was so good! And the daughter, her face when they were walking away told its own story 😩😩😩 I didn't want the bad guy to die for so many reasons but then again he had no future, this left me with many confused emotions.
1:15 One of the darkest moments in POI,  of who John Reese became , where he started.
description:
"Foe" (Season 1, Episode 8)
Music: Mogwai - I Know You Are, But What Am I?
